## LoadFn type

Load function with explicit ID for data lookup

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type LoadFn = <T, TElement>(id: string, fetcher: () => Promise<T>, renderer: (state: LoadState<T>) => RefSpec<TElement>) => RefSpec<TElement>;
```
**References:** [LoadState](../loadstate/)<!-- -->, [RefSpec](../refspec/)
